original_text: They will leave the bones all over the ground, under the sun, the moon and the stars. Those were the gods that my people loved. They served them and they worshipped them. Nobody will take their bones and bury them again. They will lie on the ground, like dung.
korean_text: 그들이 사랑하며 섬기며 뒤따르며 구하며 경배하던 해와 달과 하늘의 뭇 별 아래에서 펼쳐지게 하리니 그 뼈가 거두이거나 묻히지 못하여 지면에서 분토 같을 것이며

sentences.original_text: They will leave the bones all over the ground
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 뼈들을 땅에 널리 둘 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Those were the gods that my people loved

sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그들의 뼈를 가져가지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will lie on the ground
